As I said, the answer to this question is far from trivial. Now, when our health is very low, the PDF of our health in the future has an even lower expectation value. It is likely to go down further. If we are dead, our body decomposes, further lowering our "health". The trend is strongly downwards, so that the chance of on increase in health over a given period of time becomes smaller as the period of time increases. This makes resurrection become less likely quickly. continued...
